title: Southern California mountains see season's first snow, with another storm forecast for next week
dc:creator: Grace Toohey, Christian Martinez
description: Big Bear gets some 'thundersnow' as temperatures remain low across the region. More rain is expected beginning Monday, forecasters said.
content:encoded: Big Bear gets some 'thundersnow' as temperatures remain low across the region. More rain is expected beginning Monday, forecasters said.

media:content.media:description: Big Bear, CA, Thursday, Nov. 3, 2022 - Maintenance manager Rick Walker clears snow from the patio at Pergola Trattoria, downtown. (Robert Gauthier/Los Angeles Times)
